attributes.action: Allow euthanasia in the healthcare settings.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I have worked with pallative care patients for four years. It is really unfair when the patients are in the last stages of their illnesses, and all we can do is pump them full of pain killers and sedatives!
This petition is designed for when there is no other options for the person, other then drug or machine remedies.
Please sign this sign or agree to this petition it is better for the sufferers and their familes.
